item.title: Major Prop 8 Decision Due Tuesday
item.description: Prop 8 Decision: Court To Reveal Tuesday Whether It Will Reconsider California Gay Marriage Ban: SAN FRANCISCO -... http://t.co/NJmEIAEc
item.content:encoded: Prop 8 Decision: Court To Reveal Tuesday Whether It Will Reconsider California Gay Marriage Ban: SAN FRANCISCO -... http://t.co/NJmEIAEc SAN FRANCISCO — A federal appeals court in San Francisco plans to reveal Tuesday whether it will reconsider a ruling by two of its member judges that struck down California's ban on same-sex marriages. The 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals said Monday that it would announce whether a majority of its actively serving judges had voted to revisit a three-judge panel's 2-1 decision declaring the voter-approved ban unconstitutional. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: 'Siri, Kill That Guy': Drones Might Get Voice Controls | Danger Room | Wired.com
item.description: 'Siri, Kill That Guy': Drones Might Get Voice Controls http://t.co/8hjEP8Rl
item.content:encoded: 'Siri, Kill That Guy': Drones Might Get Voice Controls http://t.co/8hjEP8Rl The next decade could see a huge shift in the way armed drones and their human controllers interact, with potentially profound effects on future battlefields. At the heart of this change: two-way voice controls for autonomous systems, just like your iPhone's Siri app. Also, vibrating controls like an Xbox controller. A drone operator could literally talk to a drone -- and the drone could talk right back, and also alert its human operator with a sensation similar to touch. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: wired.com

Paleta de Sombras Completa com 88 Cores - R$29,99 http://t.co/CkPClBht #sorteios10 #RT Não é preciso resgatar ou validar o cupom no site da loja virtual Em caso de dúvidas no período de veiculação da oferta, entre em contato com o SAC do Sapão pelo e-mail atendimento@sapao.com.br Assim que o pagamento for confirmado, será enviado a loja virtual seus dados de entrega para a postagem do produto O Frete irá ser calculado no momento da compra, se houver O Prazo de entrega depois de postado no correios é de até 15 dias úteis Não é possível retirar o produto pessoalmente, ele será entregue somente via Correios Esta oferta ficará no ar na data programada, podendo ser cancelada antes caso o estoque se esgote O envio deste produto é feito diretamente pelo Sapão Caso tenha alguma dúvida sobre o produto, envie um e-mail para Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: sapao.com.br
